tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_impacts (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   energy_source VARCHAR(255),
   carbon_footprint DECIMAL,
   water_usage DECIMAL,
   land_impact DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE EnergySources (
  source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  source_description TEXT,
  carbon_intensity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionMethods (
  method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  method_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalImpact (
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  impact_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  impact_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyProduction (
  production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_id INT,
  method_id INT,
  impact_id INT,
  production_date DATE,
  production_quantity DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES EnergySources(source_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (method_id) REFERENCES ProductionMethods(method_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (impact_id) REFERENCES EnvironmentalImpact(impact_id)
)

CREATE TABLE impact_measurements (
  measurement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  measurement_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
  measurement_date DATE,
  impact_id INT REFERENCES environmental_impacts(impact_id),
  production_id INT REFERENCES energy_production(production_id),
  consumption_id INT REFERENCES energy_consumption(consumption_id)
);
